variable.name: SMOKEVR
variable.comment: During your entire life, have you smoked at least 100 cigarettes?

variable.name: SMOKAGE
variable.comment: How old were you when you first started smoking cigarettes regularly? (Give your best guess.) Sub-question of F34 V2 Q1 'Smoked 100 cigarettes'.

variable.name: SMOKNOW
variable.comment: Do you smoke cigarettes now? Sub-question of F34 V2 Q1 'Smoked 100 cigarettes'.

variable.name: QSMOKAGE
variable.comment:
How old were you when you quit smoking regularly? Sub-question of F34 V2 Q1 'Smoked 100 cigarettes'.
Sub-question of F34 V2 Q1.2 'Smoke now'.

variable.name: QSMOKHP
variable.description: Quit smoking because of health problems
variable.comment:
Did you quit smoking because you had a health problem that was caused by or made worse by smoking? Sub-question of F34 V2 Q1 'Smoked 100 cigarettes'.
Sub-question of F34 V2 Q1.2 'Smoke now'.

variable.name: CIGSDAY
variable.comment: On the average, how many cigarettes do you (did you) usually smoke each day? Sub-question of F34 V2 Q1 'Smoked 100 cigarettes'.

variable.name: SMOKYRS
variable.comment: How many years have you been (were you) a regular smoker? Do not count the time you stayed off cigarettes. Sub-question of F34 V2 Q1 'Smoked 100 cigarettes'.

variable.name: SMOKWGT
variable.comment: Have you ever smoked to keep from gaining weight or to lose weight? Sub-question of F34 V2 Q1 'Smoked 100 cigarettes'.

variable.name: COFFEE
variable.comment: Do you usually drink coffee each day?

variable.name: CUPREG
variable.description: Number of regular cups of coffee, day
variable.comment: How many cups of regular coffee (not decaf) do you usually drink each day? (If none, mark 'None.') Sub-question of F34 V2 Q2 'Usually drink coffee'.

variable.name: ALC12DR
variable.comment: During your entire life, have you had at least 12 drinks of any kind of alcoholic beverage?

variable.name: ALCNOW
variable.comment: Do you still drink alcohol? Sub-question of F34 V2 Q3 '12 alcoholic drinks ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: ALCQUIT
variable.comment:
Why did you stop or quit drinking alcohol? Sub-question of F34 V2 Q3 '12 alcoholic drinks ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F34 V2 Q3.1 'Drink alcohol'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 34.

variable.name: WGTADULT
variable.comment: Women's weights change during their adult lives. Mark the one answer that best describes you during your adult life. Please don't include times when you were pregnant or sick. (Mark only one.)
variable.value: Weight has stayed about the same
Lost weight as an adult and kept it off
Weight has gone up and down

variable.name: YOYO10LB
variable.description: Number times weight went up/down >10 lbs
variable.comment: About how many times did your weight go up and down again by more than 10 pounds? Please don't include times when you were pregnant or sick. Sub-question of F34 V2 Q4 'Weight changes in adult life' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: LCALDIET
variable.comment: Are you now on any of the following special diets? A low calorie diet?

variable.name: LFATDIET
variable.comment: Are you now on any of the following special diets? A low-fat or low cholesterol diet?

variable.name: LSLTDIET
variable.comment: Are you now on any of the following special diets? A low salt (low sodium) diet?

variable.name: FBDIET34
variable.comment: Are you now on any of the following special diets? A high-fiber diet?

variable.name: DBDIET34
variable.comment: Are you now on any of the following special diets? A diabetic or ADA diet?

variable.name: LACTDIET
variable.comment: Are you now on any of the following special diets? A lactose-free (no milk or dairy foods) diet?

variable.name: OTHDIET
variable.comment: Are you now on any of the following special diets? Any other diet?

variable.name: WALK
variable.comment: Think about the walking you do outside the home. How often do you walk outside the home for more than 10 minutes without stopping? (Mark only one.)

variable.name: WALKMIN
variable.comment:
When you walk outside the home for more than 10 minutes without stopping, for how many minutes do you usually walk? Sub-question of F34 V2 Q6 'How often walked outside' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Not collected on all versions of Form 34.

variable.name: WALKSPD
variable.description: Walking speed when walking for >10 min
variable.comment:
What is your usual speed? Sub-question of F34 V2 Q6 'How often walked outside' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Not collected on all versions of Form 34.

variable.name: HRDEX
variable.description: Times per week of very hard exercise
variable.comment: Not including walking outside the home, how often each week (7 days) do you usually do the exercises below? STRENUOUS OR VERY HARD EXERCISE (You work up a sweat and your heart beats fast.) For example aerobics, aerobic dancing, jogging, tennis, swim laps Not collected on all versions of Form 34.

variable.name: HRDEXMIN
variable.description: Duration per time of very hard exercise
variable.comment:
How long do you usually exercise like this at one time? STRENUOUS OR VERY HARD EXERCISE (You work up a sweat and your heart beats fast.) For example aerobics, aerobic dancing, jogging, tennis, swim laps Sub-question of F34 V2 Q7.1 'Strenuous exercise frequency'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 34.

variable.name: MODEX
variable.description: Times per week of moderate exercise
variable.comment: Not including walking outside the home, how often each week (7 days) do you usually do the exercises below? MODERATE EXERCISE (Not exhausting). For example, biking outdoors, using an exercise machine (like a stationary bike or treadmill), calisthenics, easy swimming, popular or folk dancing. Not collected on all versions of Form 34.

variable.name: MODEXMIN
variable.description: Duration per time of moderate exercise
variable.comment:
How long to you usually exercise like this at one time? MODERATE EXERCISE (Not exhausting). For example, biking outdoors, using an exercise machine (like a stationary bike or treadmill), calisthenics, easy swimming, popular or folk dancing. Sub-question of F34 V2 Q7.3 'Moderate exercise frequency'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 34.

variable.name: MLDEX
variable.description: Times per week of mild exercise
variable.comment: Not including walking outside the home, how often each week (7 days) do you usually do the exercises below? MILD EXERCISE. For example, slow dancing, bowling, golf. Not collected on all versions of Form 34.

variable.name: MLDEXMIN
variable.description: Duration per time of mild exercise
variable.comment:
How long do you usually exercise like this at one time? MILD EXERCISE. For example, slow dancing, bowling, golf. Sub-question of F34 V2 Q7.5 'Mild exercise frequency'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 34.

variable.name: HRDEX18
variable.description: Very hard exercise 3 times/wk at age 18
variable.comment: For each of the ages below, did you usually do strenuous or very hard exercises at least 3 times a week? This would include exercise that was long enough to work up a sweat and make your heart beat fast.(Be sure to mark 'No' if you did not do very hard exercises at the ages listed below.) 18 years old

variable.name: HRDEX35
variable.description: Very hard exercise 3 times/wk at age 35
variable.comment: For each of the ages below, did you usually do strenuous or very hard exercises at least 3 times a week? This would include exercise that was long enough to work up a sweat and make your heart beat fast.(Be sure to mark 'No' if you did not do very hard exercises at the ages listed below.) 35 years old

variable.name: HRDEX50
variable.description: Very hard exercise 3 times/wk at age 50
variable.comment: For each of the ages below, did you usually do strenuous or very hard exercises at least 3 times a week? This would include exercise that was long enough to work up a sweat and make your heart beat fast.(Be sure to mark 'No' if you did not do very hard exercises at the ages listed below.) 50 years old

variable.name: TEPIWK
variable.description: Episodes recreational phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 34, questions 6, 7.1, 7.3, and 7.5. Total number of episodes per week of recreational physical activity (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: LEPITOT
variable.description: Episodes recreational phys activity per week >= 20 Min
variable.comment: Computed from Form 34, questions 6, 6.1, 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, 7.5 and 7.6. Episodes per week of recreational physical activity of >=20 minutes duration (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: MSEPIWK
variable.description: Episodes moderate to strenuous phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 34, questions 6.2, 7.1, and 7.3. Episodes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: XLMSEPI
variable.description: Episodes moderate to strenuous activity >= 20 min/week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 34, questions 6, 6.1, 6.2, 7.1, 7.2, 7.3 and 7.4. Episodes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity of >=20 minutes duration (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: LMSEPI
variable.description: Episodes moderate to strenuous activity >=20 min/week (categorical)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 34, questions 6, 6.1, 6.2, 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and 7.4. Categorical variable of episodes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity of >= 20 minutes duration (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity). Computed from XLMSEPI and TEPIWK.

variable.name: SEPIWK
variable.comment: Computed from Form 34, question 7.1. Episodes per week of strenuous recreational physical activity.

variable.name: TMINWK
variable.description: Minutes of recreational phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 34, questions 6, 6.1, 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, 7.5, and 7.6. Total minutes per week of recreational physical activity (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: MSMINWK
variable.description: Minutes of moderate to strenuous activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 34, questions 6, 6.2, 7.1, and 7.3. Minutes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: SMINWK
variable.description: Minutes of strenuous phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 34, questions 7.1 and 7.2. Minutes per week of strenuous recreational physical activity.

variable.name: TEXPWK
variable.description: Total energy expend from recreational phys activity (MET-hours/week)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 34, questions 6, 6.1, 6.2, 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, 7.5, and 7.6. Total MET-hours per week. Expenditure of energy from recreational physical activity (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity in kcal/week/kg).

variable.name: WALKEXP
variable.comment: Computed from Form 34, questions 6, 6.1, and 6.2. Expenditure of energy from physical activity from walking in kcal/week/kg (MET-hours per week).

variable.name: HARDEXP
variable.comment: Computed from Form 34, questions 7.1 and 7.2. Energy expenditure from strenuous or very hard exercise (for example, aerobics, aerobic dancing, jogging, tennis, swimming laps) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: MODEXP
variable.comment: Computed from Form 34, questions 7.3 and 7.4. Energy expenditure from moderate exercise (for example, biking outdoors, using an exercise machine, calisthenics, easy swimming, popular or folk dancing) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: MILDEXP
variable.comment: Computed from Form 34, questions 7.5 and 7.6. Energy expenditure from mild exercise (for example, slow dancing, bowling, golf) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: AVWKEXP
variable.comment: Computed from Form 34, questions 6, 6.1 and 6.2. Energy expenditure from average walking (2-3 mph) in MET-hours per week. If question 6.2 (speed of walking) was marked as 'don't know' or was missing, the speed was assumed to be 2-3 mph.

variable.name: FFWKEXP
variable.description: Energy expend from walking fairly fast (MET-hours/week)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 34, questions 6, 6.1 and 6.2. Energy expenditure form walking fairly fast (3-4 mph) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: VFWKEXP
variable.description: Energy expend from walking very fast (MET-hours/week)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 34, questions 6, 6.1, and 6.2. Energy expenditure from walking very fast (> 4 mph) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: SMOKING
variable.comment: Computed from Form 34, questions 1, 1.2, and 1.5. Combines questions into a three category smoking status variable (never/past/current).

variable.name: ALCSWK
variable.comment: Computed from Form 34, questions 3 and 3.1; Form 60 (FFQ), wine, beer and liquor servings. Number of servings per week of beer, wine and/or liquor based on a medium serving size which is 12oz of beer, 6oz of wine and 1 1/2 oz of liquor. If all three variables are missing, set to missing.

variable.name: ALCOHOL
variable.comment: Computed from Form 34, questions 3 and 3.1; Form 60 (FFQ), wine, beer and liquor servings. Categorization of alcohol intake combining questions on past and current use and number of current servings per week from the FFQ.
